name: Clockwork (itch)
description:
This game and idea was specifically developed for the Github Game Off for November 2017. 

KingWombat and I decided to finish off the project, this game was developed in Godot 2.1.4. It is a top-down physics puzzler where you take on the role of Dial our hero who saves the grand father clock from retirement. There are 33 levels in the full game with a range of difficulties and challenges.

Please comment if you have any technical problems playing the game and I will address them to the best of my ability.
